execution_plan.description: Get the distinct IDs of customers who have placed at least one order.
Get first name, middle initial and last name for customers whose IDs are NOT in the list of customers who placed orders (i.e., customers with no orders).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, customer_first_name, customer_middle_initial, customer_last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN ($step1.customer_id);
